means: 严惩（某人）（尤指责打）( chastise的过去式 )

sentence.Network_en: Thomas Rane chastised Peters for his cruelty.
sentence.Network_cn: 托马斯·拉纳严厉训斥彼得斯的残酷行为。

sentence.Network_en: He chastised the team for their lack of commitment.
sentence.Network_cn: 他指责队伍未竭尽全力。

sentence.Network_en: The Securities Commission chastised the firm but imposed no fine.
sentence.Network_cn: 证券委员会严厉批评了那家公司，不过没有处以罚款。

PerfectNetExp.abs: our government chastised the behaviors of nato ., 我国政府强烈谴责了北约的行为.

list.abs: we should inflict severe chastisement on criminals ., 我们应该对罪犯施加严厉的惩罚.
asking a question During the computer class , the teacher chastised one boy for talking to the girl sitting behind him .问问题计算机课上，老师批评一个男生，因为他和后边的女生说话。
they chastised the government for lacking vitality and strength .他们抨击政府软弱无能。
our government chastised the behaviors of nato ., 我国政府强烈谴责了北约的行为.

entry.def: If you chastise someone, you speak to them angrily or punish them for something wrong that they have done.

example.ex: Thomas Rane chastised Peters for his cruelty...
example.tran: 托马斯·拉纳严厉训斥彼得斯的残酷行为。

example.ex: The Securities Commission chastised the firm but imposed no fine...
example.tran: 证券委员会严厉批评了那家公司，不过没有处以罚款。

sentences.sentence: "the chastised child sat humbly in the corner"

auth_sentence.content: The overweening cleverboots whom the critics have insufficiently chastised.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The overweening cleverboots whom the critics have insufficiently chastised.

auth_sentence.content: I was chastised for not having put in wheelchair bars.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was chastised for not having put in wheelchair bars.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was chastised for not having put in wheelchair bars.

auth_sentence.content: I was chastised for not having made a living will.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was chastised for not having made a living will.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was chastised for not having made a living will.
